name: Space Astra
description:
Space Astra

A small game with 3 levels made for the purpose of learning.

Feel free to play and suggest any improvements in the comments bellow. I do plan in improving it and add more in the future but I am still learning so will for sure take time. If any interest exist for donating, this will go towards game dev my family. 

Thank you for playing!
